kjv_def: born, country(-man), diversity, generation, kind(-red), nation, offspring, stock
strongs_def: "kin" (abstract or concrete, literal or figurative, individual or collective)
outline:
1. kindred
    1. offspring
    2. family
    3. stock, tribe, nation
      1. i.e. nationality or descent from a particular people
    4. the aggregate of many individuals of the same nature, kind, sort
